list.abs: corona ①电晕，日冕 ②冠状物corona guard 电晕防护器coronary 冠状的
...投射纤维(projection fibers)是联系大脑皮质与皮质下结构的上、下行纤维，[1]其中大部分纤维呈辐射状投射至大脑皮质，此部分纤维称辐射冠(corona radiata)。投射纤维通过尾状核、背侧丘脑与豆状核之间聚集成宽阔致密的白质带，称为内囊(internal capsule)，横断面上的两侧内囊呈尖伸向内.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in sense 4): from Latin, wreath, crown'
late 19th cent.: from Spanish La Corona, literally 'the crown', originally a proprietary name

encyclopedia.content: CORONA品牌？ ?“CORONA” 源自拉丁语，“珂罗”二字含义为 “皇冠” ，其文在《辞海》中诠释为 “美玉” ；“娜”有“婀娜多姿”之意，突出展现女性形体的曲线。 CORONA以最符合潮流的设计理念，通过感性的、时尚的、精致的表现手法，来实现和满足当代女性展现自我的个性需求。独具匠心的设计师们打破传统理念，以超现实主义和功能性设计，利用压花、刺绣等各种手段使面料活了起来，将CORONA的每款衣服打造成了具备生命力的艺术

entry.def: The sun's corona is its outer atmosphere.

means.word_mean: 1. the outermost region of the sun's atmosphere; visible as a white halo during a solar eclipse
2. (botany) the trumpet shaped or cup shaped outgrowth of the corolla of a daffodil or narcissus flower
3. an electrical discharge accompanied by ionization of surrounding atmosphere
4. one or more circles of light seen around a luminous object
5. (anatomy) any structure that resembles a crown in shape
6. a long cigar with blunt ends
